content:
#22105 proves that discrete spaces are 0-dimensional manifolds (namely, modelled over a space which is Unique). This closes #5462.

These instances conflict with the "self" instance, hence I have demoted them to definitions instead. Should they be made scoped instances instead?
@Yury G. Kudryashov You created that issue back then; I'm interested in hearing your opinion.
I don't remember why have I created this issue.
I mean, I don't remember if I had any plans to actually use these instances, or just thought of an obvious hole in the API.
